item.title: Using BDK to create BIP157 SPV wallet (aka Neutrino)
item.description: Introduction Compact Filters: Compact filters are the latest specification of Bitcoin SPV node implementation as per BIP157 and BIP158. Such light clients were envisioned by Satoshi himself in his original white paper, but due to lack of robust privacy and trust guarantees using conventional bloomfilters, these type of nodes never got popular. Enters BIP157, which described a new type of filters for Bitcoin Blockchain data, known as compact_filters. The Neutrino project pioneered the use of compact filter based light client nodes for using with Lightning Network wallets.
